column1: Q1: Are they suitable for outdoor signage use?

A1: The product information and customer reviews provide conflicting information about suitability for outdoor signage. While the product description doesn't mention anything about outdoor use, customers have used them for outdoor signage and have mostly positive things to say. One customer said the markers are "incredible" for making beer signs at work. Another customer said they work great on glass or chalk boards, but don't seem to last very long.
Q2: Do the tips dry out quickly if left uncapped?

A2: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the tips drying out, customers have complained that the tips dry out quickly. One customer said the chalk liquid dries out and it takes forever to get it going again. Another customer said half of the markers had already stopped working within a week of using them.
Q3: Do their tips tend to fray or wear down quickly?

A3: While the product description doesn't mention anything about tip durability, customers have mentioned that the tips can fray or wear down quickly with heavy use or on textured surfaces. One customer said the tips were "completely flattened and frayed" after priming.
Q4: Do their tips tend to fray or wear down quickly on rough surfaces?

A4: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the tips fraying, customers have complained that the tips dry out quickly and fray on rough surfaces. One customer said the tips are "mushy" and don't transfer ink well on textured surfaces. Another customer said the plastic tips dry out and take forever to get going again.
Q5: Do they offer refills or replacement tips?
A5: The product information does not mention anything about refills or replacement tips being offered. However, customers have complained that the tips fray or wear down quickly with heavy use.
Q6: Are refills readily available for extended use?

A6: The product information does not mention anything about refills being available for the chalk markers. While customers appreciate the vibrant colors and easy cleanup, some complain that the tips dry out quickly with heavy use.
Q7: Are the caps secure enough to prevent accidental inking?

A7: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the caps, customers have complained that the markers leak and ink gets everywhere. One customer said the markers leak badly over everything and you have to push the tip down a few times to get the ink flowing.
Q8: Are their caps designed to prevent drying out?

A8: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the caps, customers have complained that the markers leak and dry out quickly. One customer said the markers leak badly over everything and you have to push the tip down a few times to get the ink flowing.
Q9: Are they suitable for writing on glossy surfaces?

A9: The product description mentions that these chalk markers can be used on many surfaces including glass, mirrors, and other non-porous surfaces. Customers agree, saying that they work well on labels and windows.
Q10: Are they suitable for writing on car windows?
A10: The product information mentions these can be used on car windows as they work on non-porous surfaces and are erasable.
Q11: Are they easy to erase from car windows?

A11: While the product information doesn't specifically mention car windows, customers report that these markers work well on glass and are erasable. One review mentions using them on a car window and being able to easily wipe them away.
Q12: Do markers contain toxic chemicals harmful if ingested?
A12: The product information mentions these chalk markers are non-toxic and safe for use at home. However, it is best to keep them out of reach of children as accidental ingestion can be harmful.
Q13: Do their tips wear down quickly with frequent use?

A13: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the durability of the tips, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q14: Do their tips tend to fray or split after extended use?

A14: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the durability of the tips, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q15: How durable are their tips against frequent use?

A15: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the durability of the tips, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q16: Do their tips offer smooth or rough writing experience?

A16: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the writing experience, customers generally have positive things to say about the tips. They mention the tips provide a smooth, bold writing experience on various surfaces.
Q17: Are their tips easily replaceable if they wear down?

A17: The product information doesn't mention anything about replaceable tips. However, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q18: Are refills or replacement tips available for them?

A18: While the product description doesn't mention anything about replaceable tips, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q19: Do tips wear down unevenly when used extensively?

A19: While the product description doesn't mention anything about tip durability, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q20: Do they offer refills for the worn out tips?

A20: Based on customer reviews, replacement tips do not seem to be available for these chalk markers. While the product description doesn't mention anything about replaceable tips, customers say the tips are not durable. Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q21: Do markers contain toxic chemicals or odors?
A21: The product description mentions that the chalk markers are non-toxic and mess-free. However, customers also report that the markers are high quality with vibrant colors.
Q22: Do their tips dry out quickly if left uncapped?

A22: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the tips drying out, customers say some markers arrived dried out. Others report that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use.
Q23: Do their tips tend to fray or wear down quickly?

A23: While the product description doesn't mention anything about tip durability, customers say the tips are not durable.    Some mention that the tips fray and flatten quickly with heavy use on textured surfaces.
Q24: Do their caps seal tightly to prevent drying out?

A24: While the product description doesn't mention anything about the caps sealing tightly, customers report that the markers are high quality with vibrant colors.    However, some markers arrived dried out.
Q25: Are refills available for the markers?

A25: I did not find any information about refills being available for these markers.    While the product description doesn't mention refills, customers also do not ask about refills in the questions section.
Q26: Are their inks waterproof or smudge-proof once dried?

A26: While the product description doesn't mention anything about waterproof or smudge-proof ink, customers report that the markers are high quality with vibrant colors.    However, some markers arrived dried out.
Q27: Are their inks fade-resistant over time?

A27: Unfortunately, the product information doesn't specify if the ink is fade-resistant over time.    While customers appreciate the vibrant colors, there is no mention of how long the ink will last before fading.    Since the markers are marketed for various uses like coloring, drawing, and writing, fade-resistance would be an important factor.    However, customer reviews don't address this.    For long-lasting markers, you may want to look for products explicitly advertised as fade-resistant or archival quality.
